abstract: Barbara Lippert, formerly from Adweek, is joining Bob Garfield, formerly of Ad Age; both will be editors at large for MediaPost. Their first assignment is to file video reports from the annual advertising awards in Cannes, France.
snippet: Barbara Lippert, formerly from Adweek, is joining Bob Garfield, formerly of Ad Age; both will be editors at large for MediaPost. Their first assignment is to file video reports from the annual advertising awards in Cannes, France.
lead_paragraph: For decades, the trade publications Advertising Age and Adweek have fought as fiercely as any of the pairs of marketing rivals they cover — Coke and Pepsi, Kellogg and General Mills,  PC and Mac. Their competition was typified for many years by their dueling ad critics, Bob Garfield for Ad Age and Barbara Lippert for Adweek.

headline.main: Once-Dueling Ad Critics Are Teaming Up at MediaPost
